sense.name: fasten or attach with tape
sense.examples: Ashley taped his picture to the inside of her locker door. They will tape up your pants (for guys) if undies are showing.

sense.name: record audio or video on magnetic tape or electronically
sense.examples: The president taped his radio address this morning. She tapes 'All My Children' while she's at work and then watches it when she gets home. He taped more than 19 video entries for 'Primetime.'
